predicate.note: Frames file for 'reproduce' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4, Framenet entry Duplication.

example.name: active
example.text: Twenty years later, two California academics, Stanley Cohen and Herbert Boyer, made ``recombinant'' DNA, transplanting a toad's gene into bacteria, which then *trace* reproduced toad genes.

example.name: passive, poetry
example.text: The effete Tyrannosaurus Rex / Had strict Cretaceous views on sex, / And that is why you only see him / Reproduced in the museum.
example.note: That just doesn't scan at all.
